subject: Flock Safety Case # 01070403
body:
You don't often get email from donotreply@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Thank you for contacting Flock Safety Support. We have received your email and opened a support case # 01070403 for you.

A support team member will review your request and respond within 48 business hours (Monday-Friday, 8 AM - 8 PM EST).

For urgent assistance, please visit our Help Center https://help.flocksafety.com/  or call us at 1-866-901-1781 during business hours and reference the case number above for immediate support.

Stay safe,
Flock Safety Support


Original Message:

Good morning,

We are configuring Microsoft Entra SSO with our Flock dashboard and need the connection ID information. Thank you!


https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/identity/saas-apps/flock-safety-tutorial

[cid:image001.png@01DBC95F.B5981280]

Travis Shannon
Sr. Application Support Technician
Eugene Police Department
300 Country Club Road
Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541)-682-5806

[cid:image002.png@01DBC95F.B5981280]

To unsubscribe from this group and stop receiving emails from it, send an email to support+unsubscribe@flocksafety.com.  <https://flocksafety.my.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?oid=00D6g000003tehf&esid=018Pi00000jztLs&from=ext>
